/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the middle of the street, looking towards the horizon. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. On either side of the street, there are lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. A few lampposts stand tall on the sidewalk, ready to illuminate the street as dusk falls. A solitary figure can be seen walking on the sidewalk, adding a sense of scale and life to the scene. The image is captured from a low angle, making the viewer feel as if they are standing right there on the street, looking up at the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant and natural, with the green of the trees and bushes contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
